attributes.action: Prevent the use of web tracking cookies via the petition PM website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government or its Agents are attempting (or will have in some cases) installed a tracking cookie that monitors the web activity of persons who use the E-Petitions website. This is a gross intrusion into the private lives of citizens who aim to have constructive involvement with its elected Government.

We require that the Government or its appointed agents respect the privacy of its citizens and not use tracking cookies of any nature on any Government website.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
